list.title: 1. Connect & send inventory
list.text: Install our app and connect your store. Import your products and send your inventory to any of our facilities or your most popular delivered city.

list.title: 2. We sort and store
list.text: Our team will sort and store your inventory at our micro-fulfilment centers positioned conveniently near your customers.

list.title: 3. Shipped & delivered within hours
list.text: Once an order is placed, we pack and send your order out using local courier partners. All tracked conveniently through your custom tracking page.
